ERROR_NO_SCREEN_AREA: Message for developer: Need to define <div id=gx_screenArea> in order to support label click & double click events
CSS_ID_MESSAGE: Message for developer: Must declare id='gx_colorsCss' for the a css include in the current page
ERROR_SELECT_KEY: Message for developer: Event not fired , use the onclick event
ERROR_KEYBOARD_MAPPING_NO_FUNCTION: For developer: Function doesn't exists. keyCode=
ERR_INVALID_KEYBOARD_MAPPING:
MESSAGE FOR DEVELOPER !!!
Invalid keyboard mapping...
ERR_KEYBOARD_MAPPING_NOT_INITIALIZED: Keyboard mapping is not initialized , reloading keyboard mapping
SCREENID_MISMATCH_OCCURED_DURING_SENDKEY: screenId mismatch occured during sendKeys call
ERROR_WHEN_SENDING_OATH@_CODE_TO_APX_RES: Error when sending oauth2 code to APX REST API.
COULDNT_GET_REDIRCT)URI_FROM_REST_API: couldn't get redirect_uri from REST API.
FAILED_TO_GET_SCREEN_FROM_REST_API: failed to get screen from rest-API
